Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Two teams of three compete to complete a chain of words after the first and last words in the chain are revealed. The team that completes the most chains wins and advances to a bonus round to determine the amount of money won. Dylan Lane hosts.

programme.title: Catch 21

programme.title: Catch 21

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: Unassuming people enter a taxi cab as simple passengers taking a normal ride, only to be surprised when they discover that they're instant contestants; Adam Grove, asks the passengers trivia questions as he escorts them to their destination.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Celebrity contestants include Hill Harper, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Sara Haines and James Van Der Beek.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash -- up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.desc: Contestants get a chance to win money, from one penny to $1 million.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run) and hosted until his death in 2020.

programme.title: Press Your Luck

The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run) and hosted until his death in 2020.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Gene Rayburn hosts this comedy-game show hybrid in which contestants try to match answers given by celebrities to humorous, and often risque, fill-in-the-blank questions. programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.desc: Lives of surfers, snowboarders and action-sports legends.

programme.title: Drive Thru USA
programme.desc: Surfers Donavon Frankenreiter, Tim Curran and Shawn "Barney" Barron journey down the California coast while living in an RV.

programme.title: The Making of Ultimate Wave Tahiti 3D
programme.desc: The Making of the Ultimate Wave Tahiti is the first ever IMAX 3D surf film. Featuring Kelly Slater, the Ultimate Wave Tahiti follows a quest to find the perfect wave-riding experience. Filmed in Tahiti and the islands of French Polynesia, it showcases dramatic giant screen surfing.

programme.title: Thrillbillies
programme.desc: Revisiting the most misguided adventures, ridiculous stunts and golden moments.

programme.title: MXGP Behind the Gate
programme.desc: The host shares unseen snippets of various FIM Motocross World Championship races, where professional riders compete to win the title.

programme.title: MXGP Behind the Gate
programme.desc: The host shares unseen snippets of various FIM Motocross World Championship races, where professional riders compete to win the title.

programme.title: Highlights Simple Session 2023 - Skate
programme.desc: The best moments from the skateboard competition at the Simple Session 2023, in Tallinn, Estonia.

programme.title: iDabble VM
programme.desc: Mark Appleyard hosts a quarterly video magazine dedicated to covering the ins and outs of skateboarding and the culture surrounding it.

programme.title: Highlights Simple Session 2023 - Skate
programme.desc: The best moments from the skateboard competition at the Simple Session 2023, in Tallinn, Estonia.

programme.title: Highlights Simple Session 2023 - BMX
programme.desc: Global BMX stars shine in Tallinn, Estonia, for Simple Session 2023's celebration of skill and camaraderie.

programme.title: Dew Tour 2015 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the 2015 Dew Tour event, that took place at Chicago and Los Angeles with the amazing winning runs by Kelvin Hoefler, Jimmy Wilkins and many more.

programme.title: Do Rad Stuff: My Bikini Trip with the Rip Curl Women's Team
programme.desc: Do Rad Stuff is a fun trip from Rip Curl's women's team through Bali. The surfers show us where we can catch amazing waves in one of the most beautiful spots on the planet.

programme.title: Bubba's World
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes access to supercross champion James "Bubba" Stewart.

programme.title: Built to Shred
programme.desc: Jeff King and the "Built to Shred" crew put recyclables to the test.

programme.title: The Captain & Casey Show
programme.desc: Oddball anchormen Jeff "The Captain" Carlson and Chris Casey share the latest news in the world of skateboarding in this on-the-cheap, bizarro broadcast designed to appeal to the sensibilities of today's young skaters. Set in what appears to be a wood-paneled basement, our two sick hosts discuss their favorite sport, with top dogs of the skateboard circuit dropping in for a visit. Posers like Mom and Dad might find these freewheeling goofballs a bit sketchy, but their teenage kids will be stoked.

programme.desc: Extreme athletes and recording artists share a stage.

programme.title: M80
programme.desc: A wild ride into the fast-paced and often unruly world of freestyle motocross.

programme.title: O Marisquiño 2023
programme.desc: Skaters, BMXers, and mountain bikers gather in Vigo, Spain, for O Marisquiño 2023.

programme.title: The Making of Ultimate Wave Tahiti 3D
programme.desc: The Making of the Ultimate Wave Tahiti is the first ever IMAX 3D surf film. Featuring Kelly Slater, the Ultimate Wave Tahiti follows a quest to find the perfect wave-riding experience. Filmed in Tahiti and the islands of French Polynesia, it showcases dramatic giant screen surfing.

programme.title: Blastoid
programme.desc: Bastoid is the video of Shaun Manners, the young Australian surfer who is only 20 years old. Filmed in Western Australia, Shaun's clip gathers great tricks and the best moments on dry land that made the journey memorable.

programme.title: Terra Incognita
programme.desc: A tight New Zealand crew attempts to ski new lines in the unknown terrains of the Southern Alps.

programme.title: VITO
programme.desc: Kevin Perez redefines street skating with non-stop thrills and boundary-pushing tricks.

programme.title: Fresh Lines
programme.desc: A new interview series featuring a variety of fascinating guests from different disciplines, sports and arts, learning the craft of surfboard shaping from master shaper and skillful storyteller, Matty Raynor. Each episode tells a new guest story and brings you the creation of a new board. Pull up a seat, pour yourself a cold one, and get ready to make some new friends, while we mow some foam!

programme.title: Catch Up With
programme.desc: Follow the greatest athletes practicing their craft outside of scheduled competitions.

programme.title: Camp Woodward
programme.desc: For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. For a special breed of camper, however, it's the season for practicing a 180 G-Turn or mastering a 50/50 grind. "Camp Woodward" follows young daredevils-in-training into the Pennsylvania Dutch countryside, where action-sports counselors and visiting guest professionals help turn these skateboarding and BMX students into the Tony Hawks and Ryan Nyquists of tomorrow.

programme.title: The Adventures of Danny & the Dingo
programme.desc: Professional snowboarder Danny Kass, winner of two Olympic silver medals and even more Winter X Games bling, teams up with Australian colleague Luke "the Dingo" Trembath for a rollicking sports travel series. If there's fresh powder and a steep incline, chances are these two fun-loving guys and their entourage are speeding there in their customized RV, eagerly awaiting the chance to display their talents. While the emphasis is on snowboarding, the energetic hosts also dabble in any other extreme sport that may come their way, as well as the usual off-hour, juvenile high jinks.

programme.title: Glitch
programme.desc: Simon Hetrick is not your typical free surfer; his job is not just to perform in front of the camera. He also edits, produces and records some of the music in his videos. Explore the trips he did, abroad and at home, with sessions in Portugal, Mexico, Outer Banks and at the Waco Wave Pool, among others.

programme.title: Untouched 2022: The Australian Freeride Story
programme.desc: Australia's best professional skiers and snowboarders chat about the consequences of hosting a freeride event on home turf and changing the future of the sport for the best.

programme.desc: A Burton snowboarding movie with Mark McMorris, Danny Davis, Red Gerard, Kimmy Fasani and more.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: (1948) Historical adventure. A man (Louis Hayward) returns from the Wars of the Roses to learn from his uncle that a family friend has killed his father. But is everything as it seems?

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: (1955) Fact-based wartime drama. Audie Murphy, America's most decorated soldier in WWII, plays himself in this dramatic recreation of the valiant heroics that earned him the honours.

programme.title: Censor Interview Special
programme.desc: Star Niamh Algar and director Prano Bailey-Bond talk about making their new psychological horror film, Censor.

programme.title: Canyon Passage
programme.desc: (1946) Frontier western starring Dana Andrews. An ambitious businessman journeys to rural Oregon where a complex web of life and love waits to ensnare him. Directed by Jacques Tourneur.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: (1994) Oscar-winning turn-of-the-century drama with Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. A Montana patriarch's son falls for his brother's fiancée, setting off a tragic chain of events.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller about a British couple who get drawn into a Russian mafia conspiracy. With Ewan McGregor, Naomie Harris, Stellan Skarsgård and Damian Lewis. Based on John le Carré's novel.

programme.title: Night of the 12th
programme.desc: (2022) Award-winning, gritty true-crime drama following a faltering police investigation into the grisly murder of a young woman. With Bastien Bouillon and Bouli Lanners. In French/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Shepherd of the Hills
programme.desc: (1941) John Wayne stars as a moody young man living in the Ozarks who has sworn revenge on his long-absent father for deserting his mother. Then a kindly stranger appears on the scene...

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: (1959) Satirical comedy starring Peter Sellers (in a triple role) and the original Doctor Who, William Hartnell. The world's smallest state, Grand Fenwick, declares war on the USA.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Shenandoah
programme.desc: (1965) Western. James Stewart stars as a wealthy Virginia farming patriarch trying to keep his family together and safe in the midst of the encroaching American Civil War.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: (2013) Sci-fi action-mystery set on a war-ravaged planet Earth that's been largely abandoned by humanity. With Tom Cruise, Andrea Riseborough, Olga Kurylenko and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Beau Is Afraid
programme.desc: (2023) Joaquin Phoenix stars in Ari Aster's fantastical odyssey about an anxiety-riddled man-boy working his way through a variety of psychological horrors to visit his domineering mother.

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: (2009) Michael Mann directs Johnny Depp as infamous bank robber John Dillinger; Marion Cotillard as Dillinger's sorta girl; and Christian Bale as the FBI agent trying to put him away.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: (1983) Comedy starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster and Peter Capaldi. A US oil company executive tries to persuade a small Scottish seaside community to sell up their entire village.

programme.title: Hail the Conquering Hero
programme.desc: (1944) Satirical wartime comedy starring Eddie Bracken as a man who becomes a celebrated war hero despite having been medically discharged from the marines after only a few weeks.

programme.title: Gun Fury
programme.desc: (1953) Western. Rock Hudson stars as a California-bound settler who must ride 1500 miles to the Mexican border to rescue his fiancée (Donna Reed) after she's abducted by an outlaw.

programme.title: Jason and the Argonauts
programme.desc: (1963) Classic interpretation of the Greek myth of Jason's quest to find the Golden Fleece, boasting the enduring work of special effects maestro Ray Harryhausen. Directed by Don Chaffey.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: (2009) Psychological sci-fi thriller. Sam Rockwell stars as a man who lives alone on the moon overseeing a mining operation. His time's nearly done, but he's started to go a bit peculiar...

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: xXx: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2005) Action thriller sequel with Samuel L Jackson, Ice Cube and Willem Dafoe. There's a new Triple X agent in town and he's up against some shady government business.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Destroyer
programme.desc: (1943) Second World War drama about a warship assigned to mail runs but that ends up engaged in battle anyway, starring Edward G Robinson, Glenn Ford and Marguerite Chapman.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: (1961) Drama. Spencer Tracy stars as an unfairly unpopular priest living on a volcanic South Sea island which is about to erupt. With Kerwin Matthews, Frank Sinatra and Barbara Luna.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: (2019) Roland Emmerich's sprawling, action-packed war drama about the Battle of Midway, a major turning point in World War II. Starring Ed Skrein, Luke Evans and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: (2016) Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer and Janelle Monáe star in the Oscar-nominated, fact-based drama about three women whose genius made a significant contribution to the space race.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: (2018) Rami Malek turns in an Oscar-winning performance as Freddie Mercury in this rollercoaster musical biopic of the late Queen frontman. Big tunes. Big drama. Bigger teeth.

programme.title: Benedetta
programme.desc: (2021) Paul Verhoeven's historical drama. Sex and the sacred collide as a Renaissance nun begins to have visions of Christ, while also taking a shine to one of her sisters. In French/subs.

programme.title: In Fear
programme.desc: (2013) Psychological horror with Iain De Caestecker and Alice Englert. A couple get lost in remote rural lanes as they drive to a music festival. Frustration turns to fear as dusk falls...

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: (1944) Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-nominated Second World War drama starring Tallulah Bankhead, William Bendix and Walter Slezak as three of the survivors from a liner torpedoed by the Nazis.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: (2006) Spooky animated caper with Maggie Gyllenhaal and Steve Buscemi. A young boy and his babysitter spy on the creepy neighbour. Did he really eat his wife?

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield: (2019) Armando Iannucci's critically acclaimed comedy-drama reinvention of the classic Charles Dickens novel, starring Dev Patel, Tilda Swinton and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: (2019) Heart-warming comedy based on the real-life story of the Cornish folk ensemble who took the UK charts by storm in 2010, starring Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton.

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: (2014) Romcom starring Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, Kate Upton and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau. Three women take revenge on the man who betrayed their love. Strong language, scenes that may offend.

programme.title: The Fury
programme.desc: (1978) Brian De Palma's supernatural horror with Kirk Douglas, John Cassavetes, Andrew Stevens and Amy Irving. A shadowy agency abducts a young man with telekinetic powers.

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: (2019) Oscar-nominated psychological horror starring Willem Dafoe and Robert Pattinson. A pair of lighthouse keepers dangerously descend into insanity on a remote island.

Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp and Mr. Cousin must talk to the chief of a Nez Perce tribe and negotiate the return of a stolen Gatling gun; the mission hits a snag when a local militia captures the pair, requiring the tribe to rescue them.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: A tomboy New York socialite (Katharine Hepburn) flirts with her stuffy sister's (Doris Nolan) down-to-earth fiancé (Cary Grant).

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Flashbacks at a funeral reveal how a Madrid nightclub dancer was propelled to instant stardom and eventual misfortune.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho set out to clear their names in a series of stage robberies committed by two thugs who are impersonating them.

programme.title: The Law West of Tombstone
programme.desc: A young gunslinger falls in love with the daughter of a judge who dispenses justice from a frontier saloon.

programme.title: Rails Into Laramie
programme.desc: The railroad sends an agent to a western town to try to find out who is behind the efforts to stop the railroad from building its line into the area.

programme.title: Tall Man Riding
programme.desc: A few years ago, Larry Madden (Randolph Scott) left his fiancée, Corinna (Dorothy Malone), after a run-in with her father, the wealthy land owner Tucker Ordway (Robert Barrat). After saving a man (William Ching) from a vicious attack, Larry learns hen is actually Corinna's new husband, and that some of the locals are preparing to challenge Tucker's land ownership. When Larry decides to ride back into town and make a claim himself, he encounters a few unexpected obstacles.

programme.title: The Valley of Decision
programme.desc: An Irish maid, Mary Rafferty (Greer Garson), falls for Paul (Gregory Peck), who is the son of her rich boss, William Scott (Donald Crisp). To further complicate matters, Mary's father, Pat (Lionel Barrymore), lost both of his legs in an accident at the steel mill owned by Paul's father. Neither William nor Pat approves of the couple's romance, and the burgeoning relationship only becomes a bigger battleground when a strike erupts at the steel mill.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, a drought is wreaking havoc on a small, destitute Kansas town. Bill Starbuck (Burt Lancaster), a slick grifter, arrives in town, promising he can make it rain in exchange for $100. His offer is accepted by H. C. Curry (Cameron Prudhomme), a rancher whose spinster daughter, Lizzie (Katharine Hepburn), is desperate for a suitor. Lizzie finally finds confidence when Starbuck, ever the smooth talker, convinces her she's beautiful.

programme.title: The Law West of Tombstone
programme.desc: A young gunslinger falls in love with the daughter of a judge who dispenses justice from a frontier saloon.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe convinces two overweight women that the Shady Rest is really a reducing farm, where their loss is management's gain.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A battered hat and a Christmas goose are Holmes' only clues to clearing a falsely accused man.

programme.title: South of Monterey
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland), Pancho (Martin Garralaga) and a dancer try to outfox a swindler.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A disgraced Englishman living in Henry Dart's establishment instigates a gunfight with a man he claims to owe money to, but Earp intervenes before anyone gets hurt and resolves to get to the root of the problem.

programme.title: The Valley of Decision
programme.desc: An Irish maid, Mary Rafferty (Greer Garson), falls for Paul (Gregory Peck), who is the son of her rich boss, William Scott (Donald Crisp). To further complicate matters, Mary's father, Pat (Lionel Barrymore), lost both of his legs in an accident at the steel mill owned by Paul's father. Neither William nor Pat approves of the couple's romance, and the burgeoning relationship only becomes a bigger battleground when a strike erupts at the steel mill.

programme.title: South of Monterey
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland), Pancho (Martin Garralaga) and a dancer try to outfox a swindler.

programme.title: The Hawk of Wild River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) has himself thrown in jail to trick an outlaw known as the Hawk (Clayton Moore) and bring him and his entire gang to justice.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, a drought is wreaking havoc on a small, destitute Kansas town. Bill Starbuck (Burt Lancaster), a slick grifter, arrives in town, promising he can make it rain in exchange for $100. His offer is accepted by H. C. Curry (Cameron Prudhomme), a rancher whose spinster daughter, Lizzie (Katharine Hepburn), is desperate for a suitor. Lizzie finally finds confidence when Starbuck, ever the smooth talker, convinces her she's beautiful.

programme.title: Tall Man Riding
programme.desc: A few years ago, Larry Madden (Randolph Scott) left his fiancée, Corinna (Dorothy Malone), after a run-in with her father, the wealthy land owner Tucker Ordway (Robert Barrat). After saving a man (William Ching) from a vicious attack, Larry learns hen is actually Corinna's new husband, and that some of the locals are preparing to challenge Tucker's land ownership. When Larry decides to ride back into town and make a claim himself, he encounters a few unexpected obstacles.

programme.title: Coroner Creek
programme.desc: A gunfighter (Randolph Scott) loses his beloved in a robbery and hunts the man (George Macready) to blame, who is living off the loot.

programme.title: Madame X
programme.desc: Holly Parker (Lana Turner) is married to high-powered diplomat Clay Anderson (John Forsythe), but finds that her attention wanders when he's away. She starts an affair with a wealthy bachelor (Ricardo Montalban), but her life unravels when he dies unexpectedly. Her mother-in-law (Constance Bennett) advises Holly to leave Clay and their baby and start a new life. Years later, when a petty criminal (Burgess Meredith) tries to blackmail Holly, who is now a prostitute, things get even worse for her.

programme.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
programme.desc: Artist playboy Dickie Nugent (Cary Grant) appears before beautiful judge Margaret Turner (Myrna Loy) for fighting at a nightclub, and charms her into dismissing the charge. That same day, Dickie happens to lecture at a high school, where Margaret's teenage sister, Susan (Shirley Temple), falls head-over-heels for him. Things get complicated when Susan sneaks away and is found in Dickie's apartment, and downright zany when he is court ordered to date the teen as a way of easing her attraction.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: The conniving Ed Barker (Dick Curtis) murders a rancher and tries to steal the ranch from his widow, Jean Andrews (Ann Doran). However, their old friend Cliff Houston (Charles Starrett) appears on the scene to try and save the day. He makes a deal with Barker and his crew to drive the Andrews herd to market and split the money, but each man really plans to con the other as soon as the time is right. Along for the ride is singing cowboy Bob Stevens (Bob Nolan).

programme.title: The Hawk of Wild River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) has himself thrown in jail to trick an outlaw known as the Hawk (Clayton Moore) and bring him and his entire gang to justice.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Railroad executive Homer Bedloe arrives in Hooterville with a railroad tycoon, who is determined to purchase the Cannonball.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A young woman is offered a lucrative post as governess to a small boy, provided she complies with several unusual requests made by her new employer.

programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A disgraced Englishman living in Henry Dart's establishment instigates a gunfight with a man he claims to owe money to, but Earp intervenes before anyone gets hurt and resolves to get to the root of the problem.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands (Rod Cameron), a reformed outlaw living in a small Mexican town, learns that his brother has been killed in the Texas Panhandle, and he sets out to investigate. When he arrives, he's confronted by a trio of gunslingers working for Matt Garson (Reed Hadley), a local gambler and saloon owner. He also begins to court June O'Carroll (Anne Gwynne), Garson's secretary. John soon grows to believe Garson is responsible for his brother's death, leading to a final showdown.

programme.desc: A publisher (Susan Hayward) uses her magazine and charm to derail a general (Kirk Douglas) on the Washington fast track.

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Defying a Nazi colonel (Christopher Plummer), Vatican Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty (Gregory Peck) hides thousands of escaped POWs in occupied Rome.

programme.desc: An ex-convict (Phil Carey) and his girlfriend (Martha Hyer) cannot start over until they stop Butch Cassidy's (Gene Evans) gang.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes

programme.desc: Ranch hand Mitch Hallam becomes Earp's newest deputy, seeking to prove his worth and earn the hand of his boss' daughter; he puts his job and his life on the line when he reveals an underhanded scheme being perpetrated by the other workers.

programme.title: The Man From the Alamo
programme.desc: As the Texan militia inside the Alamo braces for Gen. Santa Anna's attack, soldier John Stroud (Glenn Ford) is chosen to go to the nearby town of Ox Bow to warn the women and children. He arrives to the scene of a massacre, with his wife and young son among the victims, perpetrated by a gang of Texans fighting for the Mexican side and led by the outlaw Jess Wade (Victor Jory). Branded a deserter for having left the Alamo before its fall, Stroud infiltrates Wade's gang to extract his revenge.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: Questions arise when Senator Stoddard (James Stewart) attends the funeral of a local man named Tom Doniphon (John Wayne) in a small Western town. Flashing back, we learn Doniphon saved Stoddard, then a lawyer, when he was roughed up by a crew of outlaws terrorizing the town, led by Liberty Valance (Lee Marvin). As the territory's safety hung in the balance, Doniphon and Stoddard, two of the only people standing up to him, proved to be very important, but different, foes to Valance.

programme.title: Pillow Talk
programme.desc: Playboy songwriter Brad Allen's (Rock Hudson) succession of romances annoys his neighbor, interior designer Jan Morrow (Doris Day), who shares a telephone party line with him and hears all his breezy routines. After Jan unsuccessfully lodges a complaint against him, Brad sets about to seduce her in the guise of a sincere and upstanding Texas rancher. When mutual friend Jonathan (Tony Randall) discovers that his best friend is moving in on the girl he desires, however, sparks fly.

programme.title: Saddles and Sagebrush
programme.desc: A rancher (Russell Hayden) joins an outlaw gang to figure out how to stop it.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: A framed man (John Ireland) takes a rich woman's (Dorothy Malone) Jaguar, with her in it, and enters a road race that ends in Mexico.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes proves a retired builder was not murdered by the young solicitor named in his will.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp rides into Santa Fe, N.M., to stop a war between two families vying for control of the land, the Finneys and the Grangers; the local sheriff backs the duplicitous Finneys, who created fake land deeds, but Earp finds the real deeds.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A man travels to Hooterville to investigate a line connection.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: Nick Carraway (Sam Waterston) is a young man from the Midwest living modestly among the decadent mansions of 1920s Long Island. He becomes involved in the life of the mysterious Jay Gatsby (Robert Redford), a rich man who throws the most lavish parties on the island. But behind Gatsby's outgoing demeanor is a lonely man who wants nothing more than to be with his old love, Daisy (Mia Farrow). She is married to the bullheaded Tom (Bruce Dern), creating a love triangle that will end in tragedy.

programme.desc: The life of legendary outlaw Billy the Kid, including his partnership with Doc Holliday and his clashes with lawman Pat Garrett. programme.desc: At the height of the Yukon Gold Rush, cowboy Jeff Webster (James Stewart) and his partner, Ben Tatum (Walter Brennan), want in on the action, and decide to drive their cattle from Wyoming to Yukon. Along their journey, the two run afoul of crooked lawman Gannon (John McIntire), who vows revenge when they escape him. After traveling through all manner of terrain, Webster and Tatum finally arrive at their destination. But Gannon has business in the town, and he intends to make good on his promise.

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: Karen Mills was a county court judge and criminal defense attorney in Florida before turning to TV to preside over her own court shows. In her third effort, "Supreme Justice," Mills tackles small-claims court arbitrations in her compassionate way, to which viewers of her previous shows have grown accustomed. As usual with court shows, cases involve friendships gone bad, money disputes and property damage.

programme.title: Justice With Judge Mablean
programme.desc: Judge Mablean Ephriam, who presided over "Divorce Court" from 1999-2006 as the first star of the revived version of the show, returns to the courtroom genre with his half-hour series that deals with life and the law. The former Los Angeles-based prosecutor takes on the typical cases that are found on TV court shows. The arbitrator says that her show "will be life because everything we do, it involves the law."

programme.desc: A travel influencer says his ex-girlfriend should pay his moving expenses; a bride accuses her stepsister of sabotaging her rehearsal dinner.

programme.title: Justice for the People With Judge Milian
programme.desc: An engagement party is ruined after the bride's future mother-in-law invites her fiancé's ex; a scandalous social media post forces a waiter to quit his job.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: A woman sues the maker of a mushroom brain-boosting coffee after she has a bad reaction, causing her to be thrown out of an opera.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: A photographer sues after a neighbor's dog destroys a new drone camera; a dispute between influencers after a glamping getaway doesn't go as planned.

programme.title: Justice for All With Judge Cristina Pérez
programme.desc: Brothers-in-law disagree over who is responsible for a broken watch; a dispute between friends over who should pay to replace a cracked windshield.

programme.title: Justice for All With Judge Cristina Pérez
programme.desc: A woman refuses to pay for travel expenses because her friend drove recklessly during a road trip, causing her to have an anxiety attack.

programme.title: Justice With Judge Mablean
programme.desc: A woman blames a repairman when the questionable parts he uses to fix her refrigerator only make the problem worse and render it useless.

programme.title: Justice With Judge Mablean
programme.desc: One "friend" ghosts the others prior to a girls trip and refuses to pay her share; a man sues his brother-in-law because his niece damaged his car.

programme.title: We the People With Judge Lauren Lake
programme.desc: A friendship goes bust when a man's risky wager is ignored; a wilderness hike goes off the rails when tourists get lost and blame their guide.

programme.title: We the People With Judge Lauren Lake
programme.desc: A bride sues her wedding photographer after he does a lousy job on her special day; a dispute over a reported jewelry sales pyramid scheme.

programme.title: Equal Justice With Judge Eboni K. Williams
programme.desc: A dirty dog muddies up a friendship; newlyweds accuse a DJ of ruining their wedding reception.

programme.title: Equal Justice With Judge Eboni K. Williams
programme.desc: A daughter brings her mother to court after her savings were transferred, without her knowledge, to an account she won't be able access for several years.

programme.title: America's Court With Judge Ross
programme.desc: A client refuses to pay a jewelry manufacturer when the lab-created diamond he made from the ashes of her beloved cat is the wrong color.

programme.title: America's Court With Judge Ross
programme.desc: An uninvited husband ruins a New Year's getaway trip with friends; a dispute between a former couple over payments for a gifted cellphone.

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis
programme.desc: A woman sues her neighbor for yard cleanup costs after a pre-wedding prank; a luxury car rental owner takes a rapper to court over a damaged Lamborghini.

programme.title: Mathis Court With Judge Mathis
programme.desc: A fortuneteller seeks compensation after a rival spread rumors about her around town, forcing her to close her business.

programme.title: Justice for the People With Judge Milian
programme.desc: A house sitter is sued for throwing away sentimental Christmas decorations; a woman brings her ex to court after his artful expression exposed a secret.

programme.title: Justice for the People With Judge Milian
programme.desc: A reverend is fired from a speaking engagement after he is accused of violating the morality clause in his contract.

programme.title: European Getaways
programme.desc: Touring the sights of London, including Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, and St. Pauls cathedral.

programme.title: 5 Star Getaways
programme.desc: This series is a sun-filled invitation to travel and visit magnificent all-inclusive 5 star resorts throughout the world, their magnificent surroundings and the exciting excursions one can do at each destination.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Paul and Sheryl Shard are on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II.

programme.title: Selling Yachts
programme.desc: Steve asks Will Snyder if chartering might change the equation; Mark and Chloe, a young couple with a limited budget, are looking for a coastal cruiser to entertain family and friends.

programme.title: Road Less Traveled
programme.desc: Jonathan digs around the Flanders exploring Western Europe's least understood region. He discovers how a Christmas cookie has turned into a spreading sensation and discovers a ghost town of automobiles with a mysterious past.

programme.title: A Taste of Travel
programme.desc: Explorers journey to idyllic places to try local cuisine, find out what destinations have to offer and share travel trips along the way.

programme.title: Find Me a Vacation Home
programme.desc: Stephanie, a Laguna local, is making a big move to New York City, but wants to keep a home away from home in Orange County; she looks at three fabulous California estates for her next vacation home.

programme.title: Dream Cruises
programme.desc: Custom-built to navigate the Adriatic Sea and the Dalmatian Coast, the Belle de L'Adriatique sails along the Croatian coast; ports-of-call are Dubrovnik, Split, Hvar and Korcula.

programme.title: Find Me a Luxury Home
programme.desc: Million dollar house hunter Elise searches for a gorgeous estate to call home in Westlake Village, Calif.

programme.title: A Taste of Travel (Asia)
programme.desc: David Reyne explores the different food and culture of Dili, East Timor, Phnom Penh, Cambodia, Khao Lak, Thailand and Bali, Indonesia.

programme.title: Bone Collector
programme.desc: "Bone Collector" is one of the Outdoor Channel's most popular programs. Since premiering in 2009, the series has collected millions of fans by focusing on the culture of the hunter and not exclusively on the kill. According to host Michael Waddell, a hunter is more than a predator; a hunter is a provider, a caretaker, and a leader, and this show aims to promote that philosophy at every turn. Waddell is joined by co-hosts Nick Mundt and Travis "T-Bone" Turner for "warts and all" adventures that take them from Africa to Alaska, and the hunts are geared toward a variety of implements, including bow, muzzleloader, shotgun and rifle.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter Andrews would go fishing every single day if he could. As it is, he can be found on the water with a rod in hand and a smile on his face approximately 300 days a year -- in Panama, the Pacific Northwest, the Louisiana Gulf Coast, Russia and other locations. A former member of Fly Fishing Team USA, Andrews is now a fishing guide who has a passion for the sport that, well, can accurately be called an obsession. Whether trolling bait for marlin, casting plugs for dorado, or busting fly tackle on epic yellowfin tuna, Andrews' desire to find and catch the biggest fish is limitless, as are the accompanying stories and adventures that he shares in this series.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: If it's an animal roaming the wild, Jim Shockey has probably hunted it. The veteran wilderness guide and outfitter has tracked game in more than 40 countries and taken in excess of 300 species using bow, muzzleloader and rifle. In addition, Shockey has exclusive guiding territories on Vancouver Island, in the Yukon Territory, in Mexico's Sonoran Desert, and in his native Saskatchewan, all of which helps supply content for the hunting adventures seen in this award-winning series. Jim's daughter Eva, a full-fledged hunter in her own right, joins her dad on many episodes.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter Andrews would go fishing every single day if he could. As it is, he can be found on the water with a rod in hand and a smile on his face approximately 300 days a year -- in Panama, the Pacific Northwest, the Louisiana Gulf Coast, Russia and other locations. A former member of Fly Fishing Team USA, Andrews is now a fishing guide who has a passion for the sport that, well, can accurately be called an obsession. Whether trolling bait for marlin, casting plugs for dorado, or busting fly tackle on epic yellowfin tuna, Andrews' desire to find and catch the biggest fish is limitless, as are the accompanying stories and adventures that he shares in this series.

programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Lily and Jack must sacrifice their own summer plans, it kicks off a new, chaotic normal, starting with a runaway trailer that each insists on saving their own way.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero and it got a hedgehog. Powered with incredible speed, Sonic races across the globe to stop uncool evil genius Dr. Robotnik from achieving world domination.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Lorax
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Ted (Zac Efron) lives in a place virtually devoid of nature; no flowers or trees grow in the town of Thneedville. Ted would very much like to win the heart of Audrey (Taylor Swift), the girl of his dreams, but to do this, he must find that which she most desires: a Truffula tree. To get it, Ted delves into the story of the Lorax (Danny DeVito), once the gruff guardian of the forest, and the Once-ler (Ed Helms), who let greed overtake his respect for nature.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: Supervillain Gru, a man who delights in all things wicked, hatches a plan to steal the moon. Surrounded by an army of little yellow minions and his impenetrable arsenal of weapons and war machines, Gru prepares to vanquish all who stand in his way. However, nothing in his calculations and groundwork has prepared him for his greatest challenge: three adorable orphan girls who want to make him their dad.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bikini Bottom is the place to be this Saturday night for all of the newest episodes of "SpongeBob."

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton creates an underground restaurant that threatens to put the Krusty Krab out of business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm; when a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds himself in the freezer; karate sparring wreaks havoc.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick and SpongeBob learn to tie their shoes; Squidward is in charge of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Flying Dutchman enslaves SpongeBob and Pat onboard his ghost ship; Gary doesn't want to take a bath.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds a police officer's badge and goes on a spree of arrests until she meets up with the owner; Joey thinks he's in love with Monica; Ross buys a couch but won't pay to have it delivered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross competes with Chandler for the attentions of a pizza deliverywoman (Kristin Dattilo-Hayward); Joey discovers that his guest-starring role on "Law & Order" was cut while watching the show with his proud grandmother.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey tries to save Ross' life when he thinks he hears gunshots while on patrol with Phoebe's police officer boyfriend.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica interrupts Joey and Ross' friendly game of catch; Gary (Michael Rapaport) asks Phoebe to move in with him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey lands his first lead role and finds his movie crew in a bind; Rachel gets an eye infection; Phoebe can't quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross has Rachel on his mind when he gets between feuding Monica and Chandler; Joey advertises for a specific roommate.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard starts to reconsider his friendship with Sheldon; Wolowitz tries to choose his astronaut nickname.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Wedding plans are jeopardized when NASA reschedules Howard's mission; Leonard says something in the bedroom that surprises Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy and Leonard try to become better acquainted; Bernadette, Howard and Mrs. Wolowitz spend the weekend together.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj wants a girlfriend, so Penny introduces him to a woman he can communicate with.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Wil Wheaton invites Leonard and Sheldon to a party at his house; Howard receives an opportunity.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang surprises Joey by joining him in Las Vegas on a film shoot; a winning streak leads Chandler to press his luck with a proposition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica reconcile and hastily decide to get married; Ross and Rachel get drunk and roam the casino; Phoebe deals with a lurker on the slot machines.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: My Name Is Nobody
programme.desc: A young and easy-going drifter befriends a legendary gunslinger who wants to retire. The drifter considers the shooter his hero and insists that he must face a gang of 150 outlaws before he can lay down his guns.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son's first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. Booger completes a job for an acquaintance who asks him to find a horse for his teenage granddaughter. The search for the right horse proves to be challenging, but he finally finds one gentle enough for an amateur rider. The experience reminds Booger of how passionate he is about working with horses, and he decides to accept the offer to train them in Austin. Struggling to find buyers for his specialty cattle sale, Cody meets with the Cattle Association Board to pitch the specialty sale to them and secure buyers. Bubba heads north to show the investors a location for the organic ranch, but when they don't show up, he starts to wonder if this deal was a big mistake. Booger, Cody, and Bubba meet up and decide to sell off their entire herd, officially putting their partnership on hold. Jaclyn comes up with a plan to mend Booger and C

programme.title: Outlaw's Inheritance
programme.desc: The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train carrying Japanese diplomats. The gang takes an ornate Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. president. Now, a gunman and samurai must lay their differences aside and work together to recover the priceless gift.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E17 Standoff Cheyenne finds a wounded man in Mexico and takes him to a doctor in a local village. Once he arrives, he learns that a dangerous bandit is there to avenge two of his men's deaths by destroying the village.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E3 Rustlers Theodore Roosevelt's early efforts to become a cattleman are jeopardized when a neighboring rancher accuses his men of rustling cattle. To save Elkhorn's reputation, Roosevelt and his men must capture the real thief and return the stolen livestock.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Stranglers After some of Theodore Roosevelt's new horses are stolen, he joins a posse of vigilantes to hunt down the thieves. When they capture a lone outcast who swears his innocence, Roosevelt learns firsthand that frontier justice isn't always just.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E25 Which Way'd They Go? The Jackman clan must sell their farm to pay back taxes. The Jackmans were not much at farming so they move to a nearby town and take jobs as peace officers. When bank robbers confront them, Lucas must step in and help them deal with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E26 Old Tony Old Tony, an irritable old recluse, has a reputation in North Fork as being a mean hermit. When Mark and his girlfriend, Lorrie, look for arrowheads on his land, they become trapped in quicksand. Tony shows his good-hearted nature and rescues them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Sharpshooter Lucas McCain and his son, Mark, arrive in North Fork to purchase a ranch. When Lucas enters a turkey shoot to win money for a down payment, he soon finds himself at odds with town villain Jim Lewis.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E18 Dead to Rights Cheyenne goes on the hunt for his partner when he doesn't return from a private business trip. He leaves to hunt for him and learns that he is wounded and in jail. Later, Cheyenne deals with an estate and lawyer.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E3 Rustlers Theodore Roosevelt's early efforts to become a cattleman are jeopardized when a neighboring rancher accuses his men of rustling cattle. To save Elkhorn's reputation, Roosevelt and his men must capture the real thief and return the stolen livestock.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Stranglers After some of Theodore Roosevelt's new horses are stolen, he joins a posse of vigilantes to hunt down the thieves. When they capture a lone outcast who swears his innocence, Roosevelt learns firsthand that frontier justice isn't always just.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E25 Which Way'd They Go? The Jackman clan must sell their farm to pay back taxes. The Jackmans were not much at farming so they move to a nearby town and take jobs as peace officers. When bank robbers confront them, Lucas must step in and help them deal with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E26 Old Tony Old Tony, an irritable old recluse, has a reputation in North Fork as being a mean hermit. When Mark and his girlfriend, Lorrie, look for arrowheads on his land, they become trapped in quicksand. Tony shows his good-hearted nature and rescues them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty's advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba's deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E26 Marriage, Fort Courage Style Sergeant O'Rourke and Corporal Agarn bring Samantha Oglesby, a professional marriage broker, to Fort Courage. The hope is for every soldier in F Troop to find a suitable wife. However, Agarn has a disturbing dream which leads to chaos among the men.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E27 Carpetbagging, Anyone? A wealthy carpetbagger named Big Jim Parker arrives and claims to have bought the land that Fort Courage is on. He plans to evict the F Troop from the fort. Captain Parmenter and all of the men rally to try to save Fort Courage and their livelihood.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Presence of Mine Enemies Ike meets and falls in love with Emily Metcalfe. When a card shark named Neville murders her gambler father, Emily seeks revenge. Ike intervenes in her plans to try to protect her, but suffers from a gunshot in the process.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E18 Dead to Rights Cheyenne goes on the hunt for his partner when he doesn't return from a private business trip. He leaves to hunt for him and learns that he is wounded and in jail. Later, Cheyenne deals with an estate and lawyer.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E19 Noose at Noon With his friend, Jim O'Neil's hanging scheduled for the next day, Cheyenne visits him in Texas. Jim refuses to tell Cheyenne any details, but Cheyenne uncovers the missing clue that prevents his innocent friend's hanging.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Stranger An inspector comes from New Orleans to Virginia City intending to arrest Ben Cartwright for a murder committed 20 years ago. Ben now must travel to New Orleans to stand trial and considers withdrawing from the governor's race.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E3 End of a Young Gun A young outlaw named Will Fulton saves Mark's life but breaks a leg in the process. He mends at Lucas' ranch, and there meets the lovely Ann Bard. The outlaw begins to soften and reassesses his choices and path in life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E24 Only One Russian Is Coming! Only One Russian Is Coming! Corporal Agarn's attractive Russian Cossack cousin, Colonel Agarnoff, captivates Wrangler Jane with his horsemanship skills. His charming demeanor threatens to steal her away from Captain Parmenter, who is managing his visit to Fort Courage.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E25 Guns, Guns, Who's Got the Guns? A visiting colonel arrives at Fort Courage. He is convinced that someone from the F Troop is supplying guns to the Apache Indians. Captain Parmenter, along with O'Rourke and Agarn, take action by going undercover to nab the guilty gunrunner.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.desc: S3 E5 The Presence of Mine Enemies Ike meets and falls in love with Emily Metcalfe. When a card shark named Neville murders her gambler father, Emily seeks revenge. Ike intervenes in her plans to try to protect her, but suffers from a gunshot in the process.

The hope is for every soldier in F Troop to find a suitable wife. However, Agarn has a disturbing dream which leads to chaos among the men.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E27 Carpetbagging, Anyone? A wealthy carpetbagger named Big Jim Parker arrives and claims to have bought the land that Fort Courage is on. He plans to evict the F Troop from the fort. Captain Parmenter and all of the men rally to try to save Fort Courage and their livelihood.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E6 Survivors Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: Reprieve
programme.desc: Sheriff Pinkerton deputizes Cheyenne, and he transports crook Wes McQueen to a hidden fortune. When someone shoots and kills McQueen, Cheyenne impersonates him in order to find the bounty.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E7 Escape to Ponderosa Three deserters escape from an Army stockade and hide at the Ponderosa. When a captain comes looking for them, Ben soon realizes how the prisoners are being treated and resolves to confront his good friend in charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Safe Guard A new bank opens in North Fork, and banker John Hamilton hires Floyd Doniger for security. However, problems arise when robbers who followed the new safe into town discover their old pal Floyd is the bank guard.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Sister Rebecca Snipe returns to North Fork after an extended visit. Lucas' son Mark is smitten and plans to play matchmaker for his dad. However, the Snipe brothers get involved to make sure Lucas is good enough for Rebecca.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E10 New Orleans Menace Wealthy Frenchman Cesar Tiffauges, who is used to getting whatever he desires, wants to buy the McCain Ranch. Tiffauges, a sadistic man, abuses his followers regularly with beatings. When Lucas refuses, his son Mark becomes the object of cruelty.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty's advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba's deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E26 Marriage, Fort Courage Style Sergeant O'Rourke and Corporal Agarn bring Samantha Oglesby, a professional marriage broker, to Fort Courage. The hope is for every soldier in F Troop to find a suitable wife. However, Agarn has a disturbing dream which leads to chaos among the men.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E27 Carpetbagging, Anyone? A wealthy carpetbagger named Big Jim Parker arrives and claims to have bought the land that Fort Courage is on. He plans to evict the F Troop from the fort. Captain Parmenter and all of the men rally to try to save Fort Courage and their livelihood.
